title: The Atom and industry
creator_credit: Warren P. Everote and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Demonstrates how radio-isotopes are providing new techniques of measurement and quality control in a wide variety of industries. Illustrates the following; radio-active “tagging” or identification of batches of crude oil in the petroleum industry; measurement of wear in petrol engines by using radio-active piston rings; measurement and control of thickness of materials produced in sheet form; testing for flaws in casting.
